title: "Oscar the Gruumush" - Let's Hear From the People!
itunes:title: "Oscar the Gruumush" - Let's Hear From the People!
description:
We're taking to our Discord this week to hear some of your thoughts on one of our most recent episodes, 'Tasha's Cauldron, a Good Start or Not Enough?'. Plus ... we have new theme music!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
